description:
Writing > Improving Sentences

Part or all of the following sentence is underlined; beneath the sentence are five ways of phrasing the underlined material. Select the option that produces the best sentence. If you think the original phrasing produces a better sentence than any of the alternatives, select choice A.

Clara Barton founded the American branch of the Red Cross, a nurse who was sometimes called the “angel of the battlefield.”

(A) Clara Barton founded the American branch of the Red Cross,

(B) The founder of the American branch of the Red Cross was Clara Barton,

(C) It was Clara Barton founding the American branch of the Red Cross,

(D) Clara Barton, who founded the American branch of the Red Cross, she was

(E) In founding the American branch of the Red Cross, Clara Barton was 

正确答案>>>

点击查看第二页

description:
沪江英乐：澳洲流行天后 Kylie Minogue 最新MV《Crystallize》！小女孩演绎还没当歌星前的凯莉，拿着梳子对着镜子忘情歌唱，热舞。一代歌后的成长史呀，很励志的一首歌，有梦想就要去追逐。

【澳洲流行天后 Kylie Minogue 最新MV《Crystallize》】

歌词：

When everything is caving in
And you don't know what you're gonna do
When everyone is up in arms
And you don't know what will get you through

When you don't know if you should go or stay
You only have to turn my way

Baby you can always count on me
Just come and look deep into my eyes, crystallize
So don't go runnin' from my lovin' Everything's gonna be alright
When you and I crystallize

Crystallize, crystallize
Oh-oh whoa

And now that we are suddenly
Able to take ourselves away
Want you to know I won't let go
Baby I got you all the way

When you don't know if you should go or stay
You only have to turn my way

Baby you can always count on me
Just come and look deep into my eyes, crystallize
So don't go runnin' from my lovin' Everything's gonna be alright
When you and I crystallize

In the darkness
When it's all a mess
And when you're swimming Through a sea of broken promises
You can find me
Shining like a laser beam

Feel the light

Baby you can always count on me
Just come and look deep into my eyes, crystallize
So don't go runnin' from my lovin' Everything's gonna be alright
When you and I crystallize

description:
第1课：处理不想接的电话-4

【莫名其妙的电话-3】

Calling a wrong number (1)
A: Hello?
B: Hello? Mr. Bernie. My name is Lisa. I hope I’m not disturbing you. I just heard about your daughter. I wanted to call you and tell you how much we’ll miss her.
A: I’m sorry. I think you are calling the wrong person. My name is not Mr. Bernie.
B: What? That’s odd. I’m so sorry if I’ve bothered you.
A: No problem.

打错电话了
A: 喂？
B: 你好。伯尼先生。我是丽莎。希望没有打扰到您。我刚刚听说你女儿的事情。我想打电话告诉你，我们会非常怀念她的。
A: 对不起。我想你是打错电话了，我不是伯尼先生。
B: 哦？奇怪了。如果我打扰了你，实在对不起。
A: 没关系。

【莫名其妙的电话-4】

Calling a wrong number (2)
A: Hello. May I speak to David?
B: Who?
A: David Bush.
B: There’s nobody here by that name.
A: Sorry, I dialed the wrong number.
B: That’s Okay.

打错电话了
A: 你好，我可以同大卫讲话吗？
B: 你找谁？
A: 大卫 布什。
B: 这儿没有这个人。
A: 对不起，我打错号码了。
B: 没关系。

description:
Attention, NBC Fanatics.NBC粉丝们注意了。

The network has unveiled its fall premiere date calendar, with a majority of dramas kicking off in September and the comedies following up a month later.NBC电视台公布了该台秋季档播出时间安排，这份安排表中我们可以看到大部分秋季剧的身影以及一个月后播出的喜剧的身影。

Get to know the new programs headed the Peacock's way in 2014-2015 and scroll down for this fall's listings...准备好看看NBC（Peacock是NBC的台标）2014-2015秋季档播出时间安排吧。

Thursday, September 119月11日
8 pm The Biggest Loser晚8点《减肥达人》

Monday, September 229月22日
8 pm The Voice晚8点《美国之声》
10 pm The Blacklist晚10点《黑名单》

Tuesday, September 239月23日
8 pm The Voice晚8点《美国之声》
10 pm Chicago Fire晚10点《风城烈焰》

Wednesday, September 249月24日
8 pm THE MYSTERIES OF LAURA (new)晚8点《The Mysteries of Laura》（新剧）
9 pm Law & Order: SVU晚9点《法律与执行：特殊受害人》
10 pm Chicago P.D.晚10点《芝加哥警署》

Thursday, September 259月25日
10 pm Parenthood (final season premiere)晚10点《为人父母》（最终季开播）

Friday, September 269月26日
9 pm Dateline NBC晚9点《NBC日界线》

Thursday, October 210月2日
8 pm The Biggest Loser (time period premiere)晚8点《减肥达人》
9 pm BAD JUDGE (new)晚8点《Bad Judge》（新剧）
9:30 pm A TO Z (new)晚9:30《A TO Z》（新剧）

Tuesday, October 1410月14日
8:00-9:00 The Voice (time period premiere)晚8点《美国之声》
9:00-9:30 MARRY ME晚9点《Marry Me》
9:30-10:00 About a Boy晚9:30《非关男孩》

Friday, October 2410月24日
8 pm Dateline NBC (time period premiere)晚8点《NBC日界线》
9 pm Grimm晚9点《格林》
10 pm CONSTANTINE (new)晚10点《Constantine》（新剧）

Monday, November 1711月17日
10 pm STATE OF AFFAIRS (new)晚10点《State Of Affairs》（新剧）
